_header: Saint John the evangelist that Apostle is
Subjects: saints’ lives; John the Evangelist, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. John the Evangelist in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAddC38.First Lines:
Seint Iohn euangelist þat apostle also isWas oure lordes aunte
                    son and seint James broþir ywis …
BodAddC38.Last Lines:
…Nou seint Ion euangelist if it þi wille isPraye for us
                    þat we mut come to heuen blisse

BodAddC220.First Lines:
SEint Ion þe ewangeliste þat on of þe apostles iswas
                    oure lordes auhnte sone & seint Iemes broþur y wisHis Modur was
                    oure lady suster Marie CleofheWedded ȝo was to his fadur þat
                    hitte ȝebede…
BodAddC220.Last Lines:
…Now seint Ion þe ewangelist ȝif hit þy wille
                    isBede oure erande þat we mote come to hevene bis

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Ion þe euengelist þat apostel also isHis moder was
                    our leuedi soster & seynt Iames broþer iwis …
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Of ech halwe men fynd to soþe þat bodi bileuei
                    hereBote of our leuedi & seynt Ion þat maidens were so
                    clere

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint Ihon þe wangelist þat apostil al so iswas oure
                    lordus auntis sone & seint Iames broþer I wis…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now seint Ion þe wangelist ȝif it þy wille
                    ispray for vs alle þat we mote come to heuene blis

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Ion þe Ewangelist þat Apostel also isWas vr lordes
                    Aunte sone and seint Iemes broþur i wis…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now seint Ion þe Ewangelist ȝif hit þi wille
                    isBide for vs þat we mote come to heuene blis. A.M.E.N.

BodEngPoetc3.First Lines:
[S]Eynt Ion þe wangelist þat a postel al so ysWas our
                    lordis aunte sone & seynt Iamys broþer y wys …
BodEngPoetc3.Last Lines:
…Now seyt Iohn þe wangelist ȝyf þy wille ysByd
                    for ws þat we mote come to þe heuene blys

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Iohan þe ewangelist þat apostel isWas ore louerdes
                    Aunte sone and seint Iemes broþur i wis…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Noupe Seint Iohan þe Ewangelist ȝyf it þi wille
                    isBeode ore Erinde þat we moten come to heouene blis
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Ion þe euangelist þat Apostle also isWas oure
                    lordes aunte sone Seint Iames his broþer ywis…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Nou seint Ion þe euanglist if it þi wille isbidde
                    for vs þat we mote come to heuene blis
BodLauMis463.Note:
Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line; follows blank
                    page after 874.

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
Seynt Iohn þe Euangeliste þat a postil also isWas oure
                    lordis avntis sone & seynt Iames brother y wis…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…Now seynt Iohn þe Ewangelist ȝyf it þi wil
                    bePray for vs alle þat we may comen to heuen þat rial
                    cite

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayne Jon þe Euangelyste & Apostle isWas our lordeȝ
                    aunteȝ son & sayn Jame broþer ywisHis modre our lady sistre
                    was marie CleopheShe was wadid til his fadre þat hight
                    ȝebede…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Now sayn Ion þe Euangeliste if it þi swete will
                    isPray for vs to ihesu criste he graunte vs heuene blis

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein Ion þe wangelist þat apostel also isWas oure
                    louerdis aunte sone & sein Iames broþer iwis…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou sein Ion þe wangelist ȝif it þi wille
                    isBidde for us þat we mote come to heuene blis

Seint Ion þe Ewangelist þat apostel al so isWas oure

CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now Seint Ion þe Ewangelist ȝif hit þi wille

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint Ion þe ewangeliste þat apostil al so isWas oure
                    lordis aunte sone & seint Iame his broþer y wys…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Now seint Ion þe euangeliste ȝif hit þy wylle
                    ysbyd for ous þat we motyn come to heuene blysse

BLCottCleoDIX.First Lines:
…Him sende here his ring aȝen & þonked him
                    alsoÞo þis knyȝht to engelond com his erand he gan
                    do…
BLCottCleoDIX.Last Lines:
…Nou seint Iohn þe Ewangelist ȝyf it þi wille
                    isBidde ous þat we mot come to heuene blis
BLCottCleoDIX.Note:
Last 8 lines only. Folio number reflects the most recent
                    foliation.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEin Ion þe euangelist þat apostel also iswas our lordes aunte son & sein Iemes broþer iwis…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou sein Ion þe euangelist ȝif hit þi wille isbidde for ous þat we mote come to heuen blis

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEint Iohn þe ewangeliste þat apostil also isWas oure louirdes ante sone & Seint Ieme is broþer ywis…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou Seint Iohn þe Ewangelist ȝuf it þi wille isVndiruonge ous þat we mote come to heuene blisse

BLSto949.First Lines: Seynt Ion þe Euangelist þat apostil al so isWas vr lordes aunte sone & seyn Iemes broþer ywis…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …Now seynt Ion þe Euangelist ȝif it þi wille isBede oure Erende þat we mote come to heuene blis

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Ion þe evaungelist þat apostel isWas oure lordes
                    Aunte sone & saynt Iames broþer…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now saynt Ion þe euaungelist ȝif his wille
                    isÞou bere oure ernde þat god ȝeve vs part of heuen blis
                    Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Ihon þe Euaungelist also apostel isHe was our lordis
                    suster sone seint Iames broþer iwis…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Nowe seynt Iohn þe Euaungelist if it þi wille
                    isPrey for vs þat we mowe come to heuene blis. Amen.
